summary: THIS TRUCK HAS A VERY CAPABLE MOTOR.  HOWEVER, THE ELECTRONICS GOVERNING THE MOTOR HAVE MADE IT UNSAFE.  WHEN YOU FLOOR THE GAS PEDAL (AND REALLY NEED THE TRUCK TO MOVE FOR SAFETY, TO CLEAR AN INTERSECTION OR MERGE) THERE IS NO RESPONSE.  KNOWING TRUCKS LIKE I DO, THIS VEHICLE SHOULD HAVE MORE THAN ENOUGH POWER TO MOVE SWIFTLY BUT INSTEAD IT JUST CRAWLS DUE TO ELECTRONIC REGULATION ON THE MOTOR.  THIS IS A HUGE SAFETY CONCERN.
